programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Covert CIA agent Martian is called back to London Station. An incident in Belarus puts Bosko and Henry on a collision course with Langley. Danny learns a lesson. Someone unexpectedly reappears in Martians life. Series premiere.

programme.title: The Agency
programme.desc: Dr. Blake arrives from Langley and is put to a test by Martian and Henry. A spooked source threatens to put an operation at risk. Dannys cover is put in play. Martian, overtaken by events, begins to question Samis motives.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies, and the FBI (2024)
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter. Layering unexpected subjects, director Chris Moukarbel explores the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture interwoven with an affair between Cuspert and the FBI translator assigned to investigate him.

programme.title: The Italian Job (2003)
programme.desc: A team of high-class thieves set out to avenge their mentors death with the help of his daughter. The plan consists of them stealing a fortune in gold, having it pilfered from them and then trying to get it back.

programme.title: Boogie Nights (1997)
programme.desc: An exploration of the adult-film industry in the 70s and early 80s, about the rags-to-riches career of a naive teenager whos transformed into a star by a wily producer.

programme.title: Contagion (2011)
programme.desc: In this ensemble thriller about a virus that quickly becomes a global pandemic, a husband copes with the sudden death of his wife, while a doctor puts herself at risk to find a cure and an activist blogger stokes societys paranoia.

programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by co-stars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined cleaner who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist

programme.desc: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregon wilderness must visit Portland to find the mysterious person who stole his beloved foraging pig.

programme.desc: James Bond tries his hand at outwitting a terrorist banker.

programme.title: One Life (2023)
programme.desc: This drama is based on the true story of Sir Nicholas Winton and his heroic deeds during World War II. As a young British broker, he traveled to Prague in 1938, three months after the war broke out. He found destitute Jews who fled Nazi persecution in Austria and Germany. Families were willing to send their children away before the borders closed. Nicholas helps them ship the children out. But in his older years, he is haunted by the thought that he didnt do enough to help more children.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon (Jennifer Saunders) and best friend Patsy Stone (Joanna Lumley) flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: A grieving mother (Sarah Wayne Callies) upsets the balance between life and death when she opens an ancient door that releases the restless spirit of her deceased son (Logan Creran).

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird.

programme.title: A Bigger Splash
programme.desc: While vacationing on a Sicilian island with her boyfriend (Matthias Schoenaerts), a rock star (Tilda Swinton) receives an unexpected visit from an old flame (Ralph Fiennes) and his seductive daughter (Dakota Johnson).

programme.title: A Bigger Splash
programme.desc: While vacationing on a Sicilian island with her boyfriend (Matthias Schoenaerts), a rock star (Tilda Swinton) receives an unexpected visit from an old flame (Ralph Fiennes) and his seductive daughter (Dakota Johnson).

programme.title: The Batman
programme.desc: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues. As the scale of the perpetrator's plans become clear, he must bring justice to the abuse of power and corruption that plagues the metropolis.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Following the death of his parents, young heir Bruce Wayne (Christian Bale) becomes a masked avenger who fights the forces of evil in Gotham City.

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: A cynical nightclub owner (Humphrey Bogart) protects an old flame (Ingrid Bergman) and her husband (Paul Henreid) from Nazis in Morocco.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of vicious gang warfare between the New Yorker Jets and the Puerto Rican Sharks, a romance develops across rival lines. 1960s update of "Romeo and Juliet", with amazing song and dance sequences.

programme.title: Rizo
programme.desc: An Afro Latina struggles with her identity as she navigates the Hollywood machine.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Wes Craven Presents: They
programme.desc: A psychology student (Laura Regan) and her friends begin to have nightmares, resulting in strange marks appearing on their bodies.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realize they're at the center of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victim's daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: The Strangers: Prey at Night
programme.desc: A road trip to visit relatives takes a dangerous turn when a family arrives at a secluded mobile home park that's mysteriously deserted -- until three masked psychopaths show up to satisfy their thirst for blood.

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: When members of a dance troupe are lured to an empty school, drug-laced sangria causes their jubilant rehearsal to descend into a dark and explosive nightmare as they try to survive the night -- and find out who's responsible -- before it's too late.

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Two professional divers (Chris Carmack, Laura Vandervoort) fight for their lives when they encounter criminals in Hawaiian waters.

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Two professional divers (Chris Carmack, Laura Vandervoort) fight for their lives when they encounter criminals in Hawaiian waters.

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus (Sam Worthington), the son of Zeus (Liam Neeson), embarks on a dangerous mission to prevent Hades (Ralph Fiennes) from toppling the king of the gods and laying waste to Earth.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The muscular hero forms Ursa Major and fights space robots to save a princess who has been kidnapped.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Comic misadventures follow when a rising executive (Paul Rudd) brings a blundering IRS agent (Steve Carell) to a monthly gathering hosted by his boss.

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: An undercover cop (Paul Walker) joins forces with an ex-con (David Belle) to rescue his kidnapped girlfriend and save Detroit from destruction.

programme.title: Janet Planet
programme.desc: Enthralled by her own imagination, 11-year-old Lacy spends the long summer at home with her mother and three strangers.

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: With his job at stake, a tech-savvy employee (Liam Hemsworth) has to infiltrate a competitor's company and steal trade secrets for his ruthless boss (Gary Oldman).

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Guided by a rebellious and charismatic coach (Hugh Jackman), British ski jumper Michael "Eddie" Edwards (Taron Egerton) trains for the 1988 Winter Olympics in Calgary, Alberta.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
programme.desc: Writer Ernest Hemingway (Clive Owen) begins a romance with fellow scribe Martha Gellhorn (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga: Chapter 1
programme.desc: In 1859 families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: AKA Mr. Chow
programme.desc: Michael Chow overcomes childhood trauma, personal loss and systemic prejudice to become an actor, artist and restaurateur.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Jor-El (Marlon Brando) of Krypton sends his baby to Earth, where he grows up as Clark Kent (Christopher Reeve) and works at the Daily Planet.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel (Christopher Reeve) gets serious with Lois Lane (Margot Kidder) and fights three Krypton outcasts in league with Lex Luthor (Gene Hackman).

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Ersatz kryptonite laced with tobacco tar splits Superman (Christopher Reeve) in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel (Christopher Reeve) crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's (Gene Hackman) latest creation, Nuclear Man.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: While Lex Luthor (Jon Peters) plots against him, the Man of Steel (Brandon Routh) tries to reconnect with Lois Lane (Kate Bosworth) and find his place in a world that learned to survive in his absence.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Deadshot (Will Smith), Harley Quinn (Margot Robbie), Captain Boomerang, Killer Croc and other armed supervillains unite to battle a mysterious and powerful entity, while the diabolical Joker (Jared Leto) launches an evil agenda of his own.

programme.title: Good Time
programme.desc: A bank robber stops at nothing to free his brother from prison, launching himself into a nightlong odyssey through New York's dark and dangerous criminal underworld.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman (Sharon Leal) puts her family, career and life on the line to satisfy her addiction to sex.

programme.title: The Snakes
programme.desc: A woman's violent fantasies spiral out of control when she joins a neighborhood watch group.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Muchos años después de haber dejado África, Tarzán regresa al Congo para servir como un emisario comercial, sin saber que en realidad es un peón del malévolo plan que ha trazado un capitán belga.

programme.title: When You Clean a Stranger's Home
programme.desc: Abby, una estudiante de secundaria, describe lo que ella y su mamá han aprendido sobre las personas cuando limpian sus hogares.

programme.title: The Flash
programme.desc: Flash viaja a través del tiempo para evitar el asesinato de su madre, pero, sin saberlo, provoca una serie de cambios que originan la creación de un multiverso.

programme.title: Janet Planet
programme.desc: Absorta en su propia imaginación, Lacy, de 11 años, pasa el verano en casa con su madre y tres desconocidos.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Antes de ser conocidas como las Bene Gesserit, una poderosa cofradía trabaja desde las sombras para guiar el universo.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Mucho antes de ser apuñalada y vencida por Blancanieves, la malvada reina Ravenna fue testigo de cómo su hermana Freya sufría una desgarradora traición y huía del reino. Freya vive desde entonces en un lejano palacio invernal donde prohíbe el amor.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Después de una tragedia, tres generaciones de la familia Deetz regresan a Winter River. Aún atormentada por Beetlejuice, la vida de Lydia da un vuelco cuando su rebelde hija adolescente, Astrid, descubre el misterioso modelo de la ciudad en el ático.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Una joven Valya Harkonnen promete lealtad a la Hermandad en Wallach IX. Tres décadas después, el plan cuidadosamente elaborado por Valya se enfrenta a un desafío inesperado.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Diez mil años antes de la ascensión de Paul Atreides, dos hermanas Harkonnen luchan contra las fuerzas que amenazan el futuro de la humanidad y establecen la legendaria secta que será conocida como Bene Gesserit.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Antes de ser conocidas como las Bene Gesserit, una poderosa cofradía trabaja desde las sombras para guiar el universo.

programme.title: Como agua para chocolate
programme.desc: Tita alimenta en secreto a Roberto, el hijo de Rosaura, creando un fuerte vínculo. Mamá Elena desaprueba esa conexión. Durante los preparativos para el bautizo, Mamá Elena recuerda su adúltera relación con Treviño y su trágico final.

programme.title: Como agua para chocolate
programme.desc: Robertito cae enfermo en Texa. Los rebeldes invaden Las Palomas, pero Tita impide una masacre. Pedro planea capturar al coronel Muzquiz, pero Nicolás lo traiciona al colaborar con Mamá Elena.

programme.title: Papi
programme.desc: Una joven documentalista captura al espíritu de su padre mientras él la introduce en el mundo de los viajes en 4x4. Desde el asiento del acompañante, la directora documenta un registro que oscila entre la memoria y un vibrante día en la playa.

programme.title: Dune: Prophecy
programme.desc: Todos los acólitos de la hermandad tienen la misma pesadilla. Tula intenta comprender sus orígenes. Antes de la gran reunión del Landsraad, Valya planea rehabilitar la Casa Harkonnen.

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere

programme.desc: A crook on the run cons his way into a dinner party whose host is anything but ordinary.

programme.title: The Two Faces of January

programme.title: I, Tonya

programme.title: Priscilla
